title: HPGe Detector Waveform Classification and Energy Reconstruction
description: Developed a machine learning model that classifies neutrino signals from noise in HPGe detectors, utilizing feature extraction from time series data of 3,000 elementary particles, achieving a robust ROC AUC score of 0.84.

title: Esports Dynamics: Predictive Analytics in League of Legends Leagues
description: Leveraged K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) to categorize player roles in professional esports leagues based on performance metrics like Damage Per Minute (DPM) and Kills Per Minute (KPM), managing a dataset of over 150,000 entries to enhance the fairness and accuracy of league assessments through rigorous statistical and machine learning evaluations.

title: Basic Image Processing Functionalities and Object Oriented Programming
description: Created an extensible image processing system using Python that incorporates essential techniques such as color negation, grayscale conversion, rotation, and blurring, and includes a KNN classifier for accurate image label prediction.

title: K-Nearest Neighbors Classifier for Digit Recognition
description: Engineered a Java-based K-Nearest Neighbors classifier to efficiently categorize handwritten digits from the MNIST dataset, featuring a custom-built 4-ary min-heap for optimized neighbor retrieval and reaching a high accuracy of 98.67% on 1,000 test images.
